class_notes:
This course will explore Dispute Resolution with an emphasis on negotiation, mediation, and arbitration processes. Course objectives include an overview of these processes as a complement to litigation as well as the study of and training in the skill sets used in each of the processes by advocates as well as neutrals.
JM  Students only.  Per ABA rules, JD and LLM students will receive credit for JM courses
